A4.text: The series has been translated into more than 80 languages.

A5.text: Translations have been undertaken into languages such as Korean, Armenian, Ukrainian, Arabic, Urdu, Hindi, Bengali, Bulgarian, Welsh, Afrikaans, Albanian, Latvian, Vietnamese and Hawaiian.
